/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The buildings, tall and modern, tower over the street, their facades adorned with balconies and windows that reflect the overcast sky. The street itself is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green against the muted colors of the buildings and the gray sky. Cars of various colors are parked along the sides of the street, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of an overcast day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of vibrancy and activity, characteristic of a city that is always on the move.
